  • Constructor Details

    • TaskImpl

      public TaskImpl(int id, String name, String description, LocalDate dueDate, TaskImpl.Status status, TaskImpl.Priority priority, TaskImpl.Category category)
      Constructs a TaskImpl instance with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the task.
      name - The name/title of the task.
      description - A detailed description of the task.
      dueDate - The due date for task completion.
      status - The current status of the task.
      priority - The priority level of the task.
      category - The category of the task.
